Posts.Content: Apr 8, 2015 01:08PM Hdsurvivor wrote: Hi life lover, I was diagnosed with Hodgkins lymphoma in 1985 treated with mantle field radiation and diagnosed with breast cancer in Aug 2014, 29 years after initial treatment. I have had bilateral masectomy and I am on tamoxifen. Like you I am also in the UK
